mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, id, name, type, pw, phone, regdate, like_area, email, event_dep) VALUES (user_id_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, 'event', #{pw}, #{phone}, sysdate, #{likeArea}, #{email}, #{eventDep})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET pw = #{pw}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, like_area = #{likeArea}, event_dep = #{eventDep} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
